description: a(n) = smallest number > a(n-1) such that a(1)*a(2)*...*a(n) + 1 and a(1)*a(2)*...*a(n) - 1 are primes.
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {my (v = vector(nn)); for (n = 1, nn, if (n == 1, p = 1; k = 0; , p = prod(j=1, n-1, v[j]); k = v[n-1]+1); while (! isprime(p*k+1) || ! isprime(p*k-1), k++); v[n] = k; print1(k, ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 28 2013
author: _Felice Russo_, Dec 21 1999
